cmt.name: CMT Equal Play
cmt.description: Wordpress site for a new CMT initiative. Created custom theme with php, Bulma css framework, and Elementor.

octerra.name: Octerra
octerra.description: Octerra is a Saas platform in marketing technology. It was primarily built with Python, Flask, and AngularJs and hosted on AWS. While working on the app, I was involved in upgrading the AngularJs components to Angular 8, creating new api endpoints in flask, refactoring older endpoints, and whiteboarding solutions for front end and back end features.

cordially.name: Cordially Stop Cancer
cordially.description: Cordially Stop Cancer was a project I worked on for Colon Cancer Awareness Month. It was build with Craft CMS and VueJS.

romair.name: Romair
romair.description: Romair was a project for a construction company in Florida. It was build with Craft CMS.

gos.name: D&D Organizer
gos.description: I needed a way to organize my dungeon and dragon campaign. Looking at some of the available applications, I couldn't find one with all the features I wanted. So I decided to write my own. Built with Python, Django Rest Framework, and Angular 8.

checkers.name: Checkers
checkers.description: This is an Angular 5 refactor of my Nashville Software School front-end capstone, a checkers game room with messaging. Written using Angular 5, AngularFire, and Firebase and hosted with Heroku. The original used AngularJS, Firebase, Sass and Gulp.

accio.name: Accio
accio.description: Accio is a music recognition app using ACRCloud's music fingerprinting software. The browser records five seconds of audio. The audio blob is sent to the server, analyzed by ACRC, then saved to the database. Python and Django server with AngularJS and Sass front end. CSS animations used to enhance design.

worldMap.name: World Map Quiz
worldMap.description: Choose a continent to test where each country is. The app collects stats on the answers and breaks them up into percentage, progress over time, and average number of tries. Uses C#, .Net Core, and Chart.js to gather, store, and display data.
